tool_description:
An API for downloading media from anywhere. 
YouTube, Pinterest, Facebook, TikTok, and any site you can think of.
name: All Media Downloader V2
title: All Media Downloader V2

api_list.name: Download
api_list.description: Pass your URL in json body and let the server handle the rest
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-media-downloader-v2.p.rapidapi.com/dl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-media-downloader-v2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://all-media-downloader-v2.p.rapidapi.com/dl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-media-downloader-v2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
